(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT no) (NN wonder))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (NNP Hairy) (NNP Crabs))
          (VP (VBP are)
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN delicacy))
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (NNP China))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(wonder-4, It-1)
cop(wonder-4, is-2)
det(wonder-4, no-3)
root(ROOT-0, wonder-4)
mark(delicacy-10, that-5)
nn(Crabs-7, Hairy-6)
nsubj(delicacy-10, Crabs-7)
cop(delicacy-10, are-8)
det(delicacy-10, a-9)
ccomp(wonder-4, delicacy-10)
prep(delicacy-10, in-11)
pobj(in-11, China-12)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (DT these))
      (VP (VBP furry)
        (NP (JJ little) (NNS creatures))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB where))
          (S
            (VP (VBN found)
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (DT the) (NNP West)))
              (, ,))))))))


mark(furry-3, If-1)
nsubj(furry-3, these-2)
root(ROOT-0, furry-3)
amod(creatures-5, little-4)
dobj(furry-3, creatures-5)
advmod(found-7, where-6)
advcl(furry-3, found-7)
prep(found-7, in-8)
det(West-10, the-9)
pobj(in-8, West-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP they))
    (VP (MD would)
      (ADVP (RB simply))
      (VP (VB treat)
        (NP (PRP them))
        (PP (IN as)
          (NP (NNS pests)))
        (SBAR (IN because)
          (S
            (NP (PRP they))
            (VP (VBP are)
              (ADJP (RB so) (JJ difficult)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB eat))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(treat-4, they-1)
aux(treat-4, would-2)
advmod(treat-4, simply-3)
root(ROOT-0, treat-4)
dobj(treat-4, them-5)
prep(treat-4, as-6)
pobj(as-6, pests-7)
mark(difficult-12, because-8)
nsubj(difficult-12, they-9)
cop(difficult-12, are-10)
advmod(difficult-12, so-11)
advcl(treat-4, difficult-12)
aux(eat-14, to-13)
xcomp(difficult-12, eat-14)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN type))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP who))
            (S
              (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
                (VP (VB like)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB eat)
                        (NP (NNS crabs)))))
                  (SBAR (IN because)
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP you))
                      (VP (VBP find)
                        (S
                          (NP (PRP it))
                          (ADJP (JJ difficult)
                            (S
                              (VP (TO to)
                                (VP (VB extract)
                                  (NP (DT the) (NN meat))
                                  (PP (IN from)
                                    (NP (PRP them)))))))))))
                  (, ,))))))))))


mark(type-5, If-1)
nsubj(type-5, you-2)
cop(type-5, are-3)
det(type-5, the-4)
root(ROOT-0, type-5)
nsubj(like-9, who-6)
aux(like-9, do-7)
neg(like-9, n't-8)
rcmod(type-5, like-9)
aux(eat-11, to-10)
xcomp(like-9, eat-11)
dobj(eat-11, crabs-12)
mark(find-15, because-13)
nsubj(find-15, you-14)
advcl(like-9, find-15)
nsubj(difficult-17, it-16)
xcomp(find-15, difficult-17)
aux(extract-19, to-18)
xcomp(difficult-17, extract-19)
det(meat-21, the-20)
dobj(extract-19, meat-21)
prep(extract-19, from-22)
pobj(from-22, them-23)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB then))
    (NP (DT this) (JJ hairy) (JJ little) (NN bugger))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB drive)
        (NP (PRP you))
        (ADVP (RB up)
          (NP (DT the) (NN wall)))))
    (. .)))


advmod(drive-7, then-1)
det(bugger-5, this-2)
amod(bugger-5, hairy-3)
amod(bugger-5, little-4)
nsubj(drive-7, bugger-5)
aux(drive-7, will-6)
root(ROOT-0, drive-7)
dobj(drive-7, you-8)
advmod(drive-7, up-9)
det(wall-11, the-10)
pobj(up-9, wall-11)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (CC But)
    (PP (IN for)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN culture))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP who))
          (S
            (VP (VBP love)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP
                    (VP (VB nibble)
                      (PP (IN on)
                        (NP (NN fish) (NNS heads))))
                    (CC and)
                    (VP (VB sit)
                      (PP (IN around)
                        (S
                          (VP (VBG cracking)
                            (NP
                              (NP (NNP Melon) (NNP Seeds))
                              (PP (IN with)
                                (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS teeth)))))
                          (, ,))))))))))))))


root(ROOT-0, But-1)
prep(But-1, for-2)
det(culture-4, a-3)
pobj(for-2, culture-4)
nsubj(love-6, who-5)
rcmod(culture-4, love-6)
aux(nibble-8, to-7)
xcomp(love-6, nibble-8)
prep(nibble-8, on-9)
nn(heads-11, fish-10)
pobj(on-9, heads-11)
cc(nibble-8, and-12)
conj(nibble-8, sit-13)
prep(sit-13, around-14)
pcomp(around-14, cracking-15)
nn(Seeds-17, Melon-16)
dobj(cracking-15, Seeds-17)
prep(Seeds-17, with-18)
poss(teeth-20, their-19)
pobj(with-18, teeth-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT these) (NNP Hairy) (NNP Crabs))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (PP (IN like)
        (NP (NNP Manna)))
      (PP (IN from)
        (NP (NNP Heaven))))
    (. .)))


det(Crabs-3, these-1)
nn(Crabs-3, Hairy-2)
nsubj(are-4, Crabs-3)
root(ROOT-0, are-4)
prep(are-4, like-5)
pobj(like-5, Manna-6)
prep(are-4, from-7)
pobj(from-7, Heaven-8)
